about: Determined and result oriented Back-End Developer with proficiency in coding and server-side functions, seeking for the opportunity in a highly collaborative work environment to improve skills and contribute to the company by exceeding clients' expectations.
skills: Proficiency in Django REST framework, Postgresql and Mongodb
Html, CSS, Basic C, Java and JavaScript
Adept at using version control system (Git).
Ability to adapt into challenging environments
Attention to detail and critical thinking
Learning new concepts and its application

projects.project_description: E-Commerce website designed using Python, Django and postgresql database.
